features.featureTitle: Refine the overall visual design to more closely reflect the premium airline aesthetic of carriers like Qatar Airways. This includes: increasing section vertical padding and whitespace for a more spacious, luxurious feel; upgrading typography weight and letter-spacing on headings for an upscale editorial look; adding subtle warm undertones (e.g., soft champagne/gold accent alongside the existing primary blue) to borders, dividers, or section separators to evoke premium airline branding; ensuring all cards use consistent refined box shadows and slightly increased border-radius; and polishing the hero section overlay, fonts, and layout to feel on par with a premium airline homepage hero.

Redesign the top navigation bar to match the premium airline style: use a slim, elegant bar with generous horizontal padding; display the logo/brand name using a refined serif or semi-bold sans-serif font; apply a thin bottom border in a subtle gold or light grey tone; ensure nav links use slightly spaced uppercase or small-caps styling with a clean underline or dot indicator on the active link; and remove any visual clutter so only the four links ('Live Entry', 'Member Management', 'Entry Logs', 'Security & System Status') are present.

Polish the hero section (IntroductionSection) to more closely resemble a premium airline homepage hero: ensure the lounge background image fills the full viewport height with a refined gradient overlay (dark at bottom, lighter at top) rather than a flat overlay; position the headline 'Premium Lounge AI – Face Recognition Entry System' in large, bold, elegant typography (min 3.5rem on desktop); add a short professional tagline below it; include one clean call-to-action button with airline-style outline or solid styling; and add a subtle animated scroll-down chevron at the bottom center.

Improve the scroll-driven workflow sections (Face Detection, AI Processing, Verification Result, Access Authorization) to feel like a guided premium product walkthrough: add section labels/eyebrow text (e.g., 'STAGE 01 — FACE DETECTION') in small caps or uppercase tracking above each section heading; ensure consistent section structure with a left-aligned or centered headline, a short descriptor paragraph, and the main content block below; apply entrance animations (fade-in + subtle upward slide) with staggered delays so content elements within each section animate in sequence rather than all at once.
